lead_paragraph: BYD said that a gasoline-powered car also would have been demolished by the crash, in which a sports car racing at least 180 kilometers an hour hit the electric car from behind.
snippet: BYD said that a gasoline-powered car also would have been demolished by the crash, in which a sports car racing at least 180 kilometers an hour hit the electric car from behind....

headline.print_headline: BYD Releases Details About Electric Taxi Fire
headline.main: BYD Releases Details About Electric Taxi Fire
